mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EML_MAIL(EMNO, EMTYPE, EMSUBJECT, EMFROM, EMCONTENTS, USERNO, EMINO, DELETEFLAG, ENTRYDATE) VALUES (EMNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emtype}, #{emsubject}, #{emfrom}, #{emcontents}, #{userno}, #{emino}, 'N', #{entrydate}now())
INSERT INTO EML_ADDRESS(EMNO, EATYPE, EASEQ, EAADDRESS) VALUES (#{emno}, #{eatype}, #{easeq}, #{eaaddress})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(ENTRYDATE) FROM EML_MAIL WHERE EMINO=#{emino} AND EMTYPE='R'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EML_MAILFILE (FILENO, EMNO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (FILENO_EML_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{parentPK}, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT EMNO, EMTYPE, EMSUBJECT, EMFROM, EMCONTENTS, TO_DATE(ENTRYDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ENTRYDATE, EM.USERNO, USERNM FROM EML_MAIL EM INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON EM.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE EM.DELETEFLAG='N' AND EMNO=#{emno}
SELECT EAADDRESS FROM EML_ADDRESS WHERE EMNO=#{emno} AND EATYPE=#{eatype} ORDER BY EASEQ
